member.name: NMDATETIMEFORMATQUERYA
member.summary: Contains information about a date and time picker (DTP) control callback field. It contains a substring (taken from the control's format string) that defines a callback field. The structure receives the maximum allowable size of the text that will be displayed in the callback field. This structure is used with the DTN_FORMATQUERY notification code.

member.name: NMDATETIMEFORMATQUERYA.nmhdr
member.summary: An structure that contains information about this notification code.

member.name: NMDATETIMEFORMATQUERYA.pszFormat
member.summary: A pointer to a substring that defines a DTP control callback field. The substring is one or more "X" characters followed by a NULL. (For additional information about callback fields, see Callback fields.)

member.name: NMDATETIMEFORMATQUERYA.szMax
member.summary: A structure that must be filled with the maximum size of the text that will be displayed in the callback field.
